website_summaries.verdict: Premium beach pop-up tent that's airy and spacious.
pros: Has handy interior pockets and a closable front flap, as well as flaps on the windows
Included sandbags and stakes add stability
cons: Difficult to get back into the carrying bag

customer_reviews.title: Very happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Very Extra Large. My husband is 6'2'' and he was doing pushups inside very comfortably. It comes a carrier bag. awesome!. Fairly easy to set up. The instructions are printed on the carrier bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use, splinters jammed in my hand
customer_reviews.text: We are most definitely not a fan of this tent. The first time we used it a pole snapped in half while trying to set it up. I have no idea what these things are made of but it split it 100 pieces, some of which get embedded in my hand. It was really dangerous. I had to cut my trip to the beach short and go to the local urgent care. How can you sell something like this? It does not seem safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for long days at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This a great item for the beach. Goes up easily if you just follow the directions. Unless somebody received this item damaged, I don't see how you can leave a bad review about it. Functions great... nice size, and keeps the sun off. Plus you can zip up the front and eat your lunch without seagulls annoying you. I highly recommend it, even to myself since i'm pretty sure i'm going to buy a second one... we have 3 kids so the more space the better! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPF 6 or 9, not 50+ as claimed
customer_reviews.text: I measured the sun inside with my $40 UV meter and I get 1.5 inside the tent and 8.5 outside (direct sun light), so it’s roughly an SPF of only 6. This is a crude approximation with a non-lab grade meter, but for comparison, my SPF 50+ t-shirt measures 0.0 UV through it (8.5 without it). So it’s not what it claims to be (it’s still relatively decent sun protection). Other than that, it’s really good. Super easy to assemble, nice details like the windows and the sand bags.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tent. It is a well thought out tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. It is a well thought out tent; the zippers, the windows, the manner in which it 'opens' and 'closes'. Someone smart designed this tent. There are no separate poles to keep up with; it takes a couple of minutes to figure out how to 'open' it and then a couple more minutes to figure out how to 'close' it, but do it once and all is good. It is light, the windows can be closed for privacy, it has sand-bags to help keep it from blowing away, and it looks good. I would buy this tent again and not think twice about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lex P

customer_reviews.title: Easy up and Easy down
customer_reviews.text: Even in windy conditions, this goes up and down like a breeze. No purchase regrets here - we love it! Update ---- 5 months later: One of the joints broke. Was under normal usage. Used the tent about 3-4 times a month. Feel like it should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ghent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beach tent for a recent trip to Bermuda to see family and vacation. I've used beach tents for man years. They do ware out because I go to the beach often. They had the usual rod setup. This one however is quick and easy to set up and take down. It's very large and roomy. I like the 3 windows and the many storage pockets inside. Also it can be closed up for privacy or rainy weather. It arrived quickly. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Room size seems comfortable for two adults, maybe three. The blue color is nice and tranquil. The one I received did not have that center pocket above the middle window shown in the photo. But it did have other interior pockets for phones or sunscreen lower near the bottom of the tent. This did not end up working out for me but the customer service was incredibly professional and helpful. They seem to really aim to keep their customers happy and for that alone I would do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This handy travel tent is light, portable, and incredibly easy to setup (even on a windy beach)! I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. The only bad thing to note is the carrying case is incredibly cheap and the handle frayed after carrying it for less than 3 days on the walk to and from the beach. The tent, however is incredibly sturdy and secure with the included stakes. I’ve used it on sand and on grass, and I am incredibly pleased with how well it stays put. The window flaps are also great, allowing a lot of wind to pass through, while maintaining sun protection...
customer_reviews.author: SeanS

customer_reviews.title: Might work for someone else
customer_reviews.text: It's not that great when sand gets in it's pointless to have the bottom covered wish floor part was removable my kids luv the toes in the sand....it's was big enough for are lil kids but not adults...can't sit in there with stroller ...kids liked staying under beach umbrellas instead...but just because it didnt work for me it might work for someone els....customer service was great Amazon does have the best customer service....
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: To convince my husband to go to the beach, we had to get some shade for him and the baby. I purchased this tent and I’m so glad I did! It was easy to set up and take down. Our first time out in the sun in forever and none of us got sunburnt! We set 2 beach chairs inside and still had plenty of room. The ONLY downside is my 6’6 husband sitting on a chair inside he couldn’t sit up straight. Everyone else had no problem especially in lower beach chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shelter
customer_reviews.text: This beach shelter is fabulous. Lightweight and very easy to set up and take down. We've shaded 3.5 adults and a kid in it comfortably. First use was on a beach in 25mph winds. It didn't blow away and no humans were injured or overly frustrated when it came to getting it back in the bag. Total winner.
customer_reviews.author: Akwafunk

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality, does not work on a beach
customer_reviews.text: Seemed ok in my living room but not on the beach where there is weather. Wouldn't stand upright in a moderate breeze and one of the sand pockets tore off in regular use. The windows also won't stay closed when there is wind since the Velcro barely sticks. Material is incredibly cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: C Geeam

customer_reviews.title: Tent looked like it had been opened
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tent I purchased from this company. I was not impressed this time as I opened the tent today for the first time at the beach. It had two stains I will include pictures. It was missing the yellow rope on one corner to stake it down. I checked the packaging and it was missing. I wasn’t impressed with how stiff it was to open and the fabric just felt cheap. I think my old tent seemed much higher in quality and it wasn’t stained or missing strings.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Extra beach tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my holidays and I am very very happy with this product, and my kids too. I recommend this tent. It is very easy to use, very good quality!!
customer_reviews.author: EMILIE S

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport, assemble, and use. My husband and I were on a relatively windy beach in Aruba we other this, so my only complaint would be that sand kept blowing into the tent. I suspect it is because of the high winds and the netting on the sides— even though there are netting covers with adhesive, they were not strong enough to stay up on our beach day.
customer_reviews.author: Eribean

customer_reviews.title: We did use a tent bag from another tent we had because the bag the tent came in was not sturdy enough for air travel
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Hawaii and worked out well at the beach and on the grass at the condo. The tent was small enough that it was a carry on Item so no cargo charge. We did use a tent bag from another tent we had because the bag the tent came in was not sturdy enough for air travel. We will take it to all the picnic's and BBQ's and to the lake as well this summer. It's so easy to set up and take down and stores in a small space like the back of the trunk it take up little room my tool bag is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelnut

customer_reviews.title: Love This Tent!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this tent on a segment that the Today Show did a few weeks ago and tried to order it on the spot...it sold out before the segment ended! No worries...it was back in stock in a few days and arrived in time for our beach vacation. It is light, only 6 lbs., I think. And, it fits diagonally in a large suitcase for air travel - another plus! It is VERY simple to put up and take down. No more than a minute and I'm not exaggerating. We shopped around to find one that we really liked and am so glad that we bought this one. I can not recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: ifm725

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent that requires an extra large suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Great overall size for two adult low beach chairs. Finally— something I can put into my suitcase and easily carry to the beach. Put up and take down by myself. I don’t miss the struggle of getting an umbrella to stay, then worrying it will fly away and hit another beach goer. This tent stayed in place and did it’s job perfectly. I will caution— though it does fit in a suitcase, it requires the biggest suitcase I have (the “I’m packing everything I own” size).
customer_reviews.author: dfanizzi76

customer_reviews.title: Made our beach day better.
customer_reviews.text: We've used it once and LOVE IT! Easy set-up. Did it by myself with nothing more than the directions that are printed on the carry bag. The sand pockets did the trick on a quite windy day. Love being able to zip it up all the way for a quick change. As far as I know, it was private. No one screamed. Lol. Roomy. We threw a beach blanket on the floor to help with the wet sand that was being brought in on feet. Inside storage pockets were wonderful for toys, etc. Can't vouch for longevity yet, but so far it's a well made product. Ventilation through side and back windows is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Upnorthchick

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to put up and take down. Also, if you use gallon ziplock bags for the sand weight pockets you can take them out and turn the tent easily to shade as much sun as possible. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We've used this tent multiple times and it's always so easy to assemble and disassemble. Packs well back into the bag and strap to carry with no hassle! Highly recommended!! We can spend the whole day at the beach now. Windows are easy to open and close. Plenty of room for all the items you want to keep out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience! Set up nicely, then after less than an hour of use, my kids Got stuck-literally trapped inside- as the zipper broke and they could not get out. They were only laying in there on their iPads and tried to get out and it was a horrible experience! Traumatic for them as they’re young. We had to cut open the tent with a knife as we could not access them! Needless to say what we expected to get out of this tent was never even close to being met. 😡😠😓
customer_reviews.author: Kay Epiphany

customer_reviews.title: In love already
customer_reviews.text: We just received this in the mail today and already in love. We leave for our baby boys first beach trip this weekend and I'm so excited to use this. I unpacked for a trail run in the living room today and I must say it was so easy to put up and take down. I'm so please with this product so far and hoping it will continue to meet our standards once on the beach. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for two and the sewn in pockets for items are great. Lightweight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Easier to set up with two people. Tricky with a stiff breeze blowing at the beach. Suggest pegging down two front corners before pulling the cords to pop open the tent. Plenty of room for two and the sewn in pockets for items are great. Lightweight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY .....  A GREAT SUN TENT PURCHASE  !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had just about given up.... 1st one (a different company) arrived with the top mechanism in about 20 pieces...... 2nd sun tent was difficult to assemble. Then I found this one. So easy !!!!! Set up in 1 minute. Take down equally as easy.. I have not used outside yet, as I just received today. So far, very impressed. Plan to use athe the beach and daughter's soccer games.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Babler

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Used our new Arcshell X-large cabana today for the first time after first watching the YouTube video on how to set it up and take it down. That helped a lot and was worth the 4 minutes it took to watch. Our set up and take down went smooth and we are very happy with it. It’s roomy and high enough to easily set two chairs in it or for two adults to lay in. It has nice ventilation in all sides and a large zip up door if you want to use it. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have the instruction photos for the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: The arcshell beach tent worked really well. Glad to have the instruction photos for the first time set up, but once you know the knack of pulling it open, it’s great. Goes up and down quick and easy. I bought it for the windy days at the beach where an umbrella won’t stay up. Just filled the sand bags with sand and it stayed put. The windows are great, but don’t allow enough air flow for a hot day, the tent did get a little warm, however, on a cooler, windy day, I was glad to sit in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: CraftynWA

customer_reviews.title: Will fit 4 adults or two adults and 4 small (12 and under) kids.
customer_reviews.text: Requested birthday gift for our 9 year old granddaughter. Had a camp out birthday party. She loves it!! she wanted purple but it was even more important that her whole family could fit in it. This fit the bill and she picked out the colour.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy r.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Beach Girl reporting
customer_reviews.text: After 3 beach trips this baby keeps delivering! At the price of 55$ just order this bad boy. Fits 2 full size zero gravity loungers inside with the attachable cup holder on one chair. Back mesh pocket is perfect for a little Bluetooth speaker spot. With a 2 year warranty honestly I don't know how other beach tents are going to stay on business. Truly I don't review often but my setup at the beach takes less than five minutes no more digging a hole for an umbrella= more beach time. You read this whole review??? Just click on click buy.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tent for a day at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This tent was perfect for a day at the beach, even in 20mph winds! I was able to easily set it up myself with no wind, but it helps to have an extra set of hands to fill the attached sand bags and pitch the stakes when it's gusty at the beach. Nice and light, love all the little extras like elastics and toggles to hold the window covers open and mesh holders inside for your lotion or a book. The front zipped up perfectly providing security when taking that long stroll along the shoreline. Easy to break down and fold up too. Highly recommend this tent!
customer_reviews.author: FJT

customer_reviews.title: Must have for families with children!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tent! We use this tent ALL THE TIME! Totally worth the money. Very spacious and light weight. The carrying case makes it super compact so it’s easy to travel with. It has a shoulder strap making it incredibly easy to bring anywhere. We absolutely love it! Item arrived on time and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach or the ball field
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It fit in our large suitcase and worked well at the beach even on a windy day. Those sand pockets make a huge difference. There is a bit of a learning curve to setting it up and taking down. Definitely watch the video and practice at home where there's no breeze to contend with. If it's windy, you'll want a couple. We also used it for kids to have some shade at a baseball tournament. They were very comfortable on a pretty hot day. I just used some smaller metal stakes in the grass instead of the big, thick ones it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful beach tent. I love that it zips up so you can change right on the beach if you want to. We have another brand similar to this that cost quite a bit more but is not any better, although a bit larger. I would buy this again if we needed to add another. This would be great for watching your children's sporting events too!
customer_reviews.author: stcole96

customer_reviews.title: Great for families - particularly with infants.
customer_reviews.text: Used this at the beach and it worked very well for our family. Easy set up and take down; compact to carry. Great protection for an infant from sun and wind, while giving his mom some privacy yet letting her enjoy the beach scene. Had room for our stuff, and the flap in front gave additional space to keep things from getting sand on them. This really made our days at the beach much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love. We got this for our beach vacation last month, mainly to have a place for our 11 month old to hang out in the shade. I liked the fact that it could be closed up, He’s still nursing so it gave us a distraction free area to feed. This was exactly what we needed. It went up and down easily, and provided enough breeze through the flaps to keep us cool. He loved having an area he could play in, and took some naps too.
customer_reviews.author: Cman

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach tent..
customer_reviews.text: I wished it was a little bigger. The tent is hard to compact down so that it will fit back inside the carrying case. Other than that nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential beach equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Disassembling can be a bit tricky when trying to fold it up properly again. I also noticed that some of the velcro on the inside privacy covers was stitched on the wrong side. I consider these minor flaws, however. When set up properly and the sand bags filled adequately, this thing will withstand strong winds quite easily. Rain too. One day it started to pour, with hefty wind gusts and pretty much everyone on the beach fled to the hotel. But I simply zipped this thing up, closed the windows and my wife and the kids stayed dry until it stopped raining again.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy and awesome sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outings with a baby. Just threw it where we wanted it set up, pulled the strings and it was done. No hassle, no problems. Just perfect. It was pretty comfortable and it didn’t get hot in there. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: A snap to set up & held its shape
customer_reviews.text: EASY, travel light! Ditch the chairs, and just bring this tent and a few towels for the beach. You’ve got shade for 3 adults or 2 adults and several children. Great pockets for holding everything. We used it for a week with no problems. Tip: take a small 2lb exercise weight to tap the tent stakes into the sand if you need them...much easier than bringing a hammer to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Nuke

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We got the first tent and the legs broke after first use. ***However the seller contacted me and without any hassle sent me a new tent and it works just fine!! Amazing customer service and the product is great for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing beach tent! I took it with me on a trip to hawaii and while I was snorkeling in the ocean I could always easily find or see where my friends were on the beach because I could see the bright blue from very far distances! It set up quickly and with extreme ease. I had serveral people even ask where I found this tent because it was so unique and hassle free!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down. Sand pockets and stakes for added stability in wind. Window mesh with fabric flaps on each side and the back for ventilation and/or visualization. Interior pockets for stashing personal items. Front flap extends the tent floor to make a “porch” for added convenience; it also completely zips up. Folds up and fits inside the provided carrying bag with shoulder strap. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PittmanRN

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beach trip.
customer_reviews.text: Great when we went to the beach, the fabric is kind of thin though so there is that 'cheapness' feel. Overall it did what we needed and I'm sure we'll find other uses for it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great way to avoid sun exposure and have some privacy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, read the instructions printed on the bag. Great idea to have instructions on bag so you never lose them. My husband has had skin cancer removed from his face twice so we were afraid we could never have family beach vacations again. This tent means he stays safe in shade while my daughter gets beach time.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Tollett

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This tent opens and closes so easily. I really don’t have any complaints about the product minus the bag that is supposed to hold the folded up tent. The second time we tried to put this tent back in the bag it ripped and just has continued to rip since. We have no good way to store the tent now unless we put it in a trash bag. I understand that this happens over time but it was only our 2nd time repacking it and it wasn’t with much force. Besides that detail I think the tent was a great purchase. It helped keep our little one out of the sun on the beach when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Houston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install/uninstall; Lightweight; Great for Beach
customer_reviews.text: Quality price, fast shipping. Easy to install and uninstall. Carrying bag has long handle to tote. This is great for beach or outdoors. Item is not heavy to carry on shoulder. Plenty of room and interior zippered storage. Three screens that attach to Velcro for fresh air or privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: It's what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, although it is not my first beach tent. A little concerned that the bottom won't hold up, it's very thin. Also, the "porch" flap doesn't have loops to tether down so it flies a little. I love that it can be zipped closed for us to change.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This Cabana is very easy to set up. Unfortunately I haven't used it on the beach yet. I hope to later this summer. The reason I only gave 4 stars is to fold it up is a little unnerving. It makes a horrible popping sound when the bars collapse. Plus it took a few tries to get it back into the carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit replaced
customer_reviews.text: In the first shipments, the product was missing velcro and tear in fabric. Customer Service went beyond the norm to replace the beach tent, and as yet I have not opened it, but I assume it is as specified with no defects. If so, I will edit again this review.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. We can’t wait to use it at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. We can’t wait to use it at the beach in the late spring and summer. Thanks for checking in to make sure that we are pleased with the product. Over the top customer service. This kind of service is not seen very much. Have a treasured day!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Schindler

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: This this is so awesome. It is incredibly light and unbelievably easy to assemble and break down. It held up perfectly on a super windy beach day and I can't wait to use it again. It has truly exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great shelter tent for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Set up pretty easily, even by myself and in brisk wind. Secure with sand filled pockets around the base. Roomy for two people and the dog. Very easy to take down as well. Flaps over mesh windows could use stronger Velcro closures as the wind kept "ripping" them open.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Chew

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this tent I wasn’t able to use it for about a month. The first time I took it to the beach one of the poles broke. I went on Amazon to do a return but, unlike most of my purchases, there was an expiration on when I could make a return. I wrote a review and within a week I received a new tent that works perfectly! A big thanks to the customer service that saw my review and took it into their own hands to make it right! Great tent !
customer_reviews.author: Kim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great beach sun shade
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! It was super windy on the beach (red flag was out) and we were still able to get this up. Took 2 of us because of the wind but one person could easily set this up. It didn’t fly off anywhere and protected us from the wind. Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions and plan on dismantle, Major joint failure on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Poor instructions for dismantle. Broke on 2nd use. I had bought it in October for Granchildren's Christmas visit. Leg snapped on 2nd take down. Actually had 2 engineers on scene too!!. I was dismayed to find there was no recourse from seller, especially because others had had similar mishaps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up and take down. It's very roomy...larger than I anticipated. It fits 2 chairs comfortably and large enough to lay down in. It zips up for bug protection and has windows that you can open for a breeze. I haven't used it in the rain yet to see how it handles but for the beach it is perfect. Comes with stakes and a place to hold them. Very convienent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent is awesome! Super easy to set up and take down ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome! Super easy to set up and take down and very spacious inside. It folds up pretty small too so it is easy to pack in a suitcase or the car for any trip. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.R

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Keeps us cool at the beach. My only suggestion would be a vent at the top. When we sit in the tent with our chairs, the heat rises to the top and gets trapped. But, the winows help circulate the air. We are very happy with our purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: lugging around a tent to the beach is a mission so to have one that opens with the pull of a string is amazing. My family of 4 fit inside perfect. So easy to setup and take down, my husband was impressed with this purchase lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beach tent after much research for the perfect product--I was not disappointed! The windows on all sides allow for a breeze no matter where the wind is blowing from, the stakes are sturdy, the front flap is great for privacy if you need it. I am able to put it up and take it down in 5 minutes, alone. I have no complaints, only want to go to the beach more to use it.
customer_reviews.author: nancy norman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend more detailed instruction on how to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It was for a day trip to beach. I had to Google the instructions on how to assemble before leaving But once we got to beach the tent assemble was easy. Perfect size for me with a lounge chair and my teen age daughter. Kept me cool against sun. Im very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: With my first order there was a minor mishap, in that there were not instructions. I was really surprised at how quickly Ashley from Arcshell contacted me. Ashley made everything right. I will definitely buy more of their products and also I highly recommend anyone to order products from their company. Thank you Ashley
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Paul

customer_reviews.title: If you’re like me and hate getting sand or water all over ...
customer_reviews.text: The coolest thing I’ve bought on Amazon. What they don’t tell you is that you also get 4 pockets inside of the tent that keep your items off of the ground. If you’re like me and hate getting sand or water all over stuff, this is a big deal! The only thing I would change is adding a booklet inside with more detailed instructions. It was not that difficult to put up once I understood how it worked. Im a 5’4” small female and did it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Twisdale

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the best investments I ever made
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best investments I ever made! I'm not a beach person, too light skinned, so I'm always worried about being in the sun too long. Now I can be comfortable inside the tent, in the shade! It's easy to set up, very sturdy in the wind, lots of storage, roomy. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Tent meets our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We stay at the beach all day and our dog who is Sheltie and is obsessive about chasing waves understand that he has a home beach and will now relax for awhile. Our only complaint is that I worry about pushing down to close the tent. It works but I feel I might break it. Other than that it is easy to setup and tear down and is perfect for 2 adults and 2 children and 2 dogs.
customer_reviews.author: cas

customer_reviews.title: Great break from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our beach vacation. We fit 2 adult beach chair inside, but I think 3 would also fit. It held up to pretty strong winds. Easy to set up and take down. Very nice product folds super small and light.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Ideal when you have little ones
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver on our last trip to the beach. Not only did my 2-year old grandson have a place to play out of the sun, but also a private area for diaper changes and nap time. Best purchase made this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We’ve loved this so far. Perfect for the beach! Large space for whole family, we even fit a small bassinet inside for infant. Windows make it very breathable and we like that the front can zip up for changing clothes and such if needed. Easy pop up and pull down too. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Easy set up and take down! Perfect for travel!!
customer_reviews.text: I did love this product initially. It’s easy set up and take down! Just seconds. I took it w me on the plane to the Caribbean and put it under my seat. It did however tear on the 2nd use, it tore around one of the poles! However they sent me a new one so it was perfect!! I would totally buy this again! Not only for the product itself which is amazing but also for their great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: eunice yesenia hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing ever.. easy to set up and take down.. best thing for the beach..
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beach trip
customer_reviews.text: I use this tent on a regular basis at the park. Super lightweight, compact, and easy to assemble with one person. Then, the tent and I made a trip to the coast. It was super windy and I was afraid the tent wouldn’t make it. It withstood 32mph wind! I was sandblasted and didn't reapply sunscreen, but the tent survived without a single rip. The sandbags really came in handy! Highly recommend this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna

customer_reviews.title: Large with great height/ fits in luggage
customer_reviews.text: Shelter is large and has enough height to sit comfortably in beach chairs. Folds up reasonably quick but you have to make sure legs are folded properly. Had no problem with it for the three weeks we were in Hawaii. This fits nicely into 29 inch luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Grizman845

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to wind
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up! It held up to pretty high winds along the Oregon coast. With it zipped up you couldn't even tell how windy it really was out there. Love, love, love! Great product
customer_reviews.author: sunshinesprinklz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Easy to set up even on a windy beach (Oregon!). Provided the perfect shelter for our day.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mathena

customer_reviews.title: Made well but I am too short and small to ...
customer_reviews.text: Made well but I am too short and small to be able to set this up with the ease described. I watched a man over 6' whip it together in no time on the beach but I realize that my 5' doesn't give me the ability to get over the gadget you pull on and have leverage needed.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rabil

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the sun shade once, but I loved it! So easy to put up and take down. I was able to fit 2 adult sized chairs in it, and 2 children's chairs partially in. It did get rather messy with the kids walking on it with their sandy/wet feet and some of the mud didn't come off. It was a struggle to get it back in the original bag, so I just threw it in a garbage bag. But, overall, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gunsch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used at the beach. Once you get the hang of it, only takes 2 seconds to erect and then a few minutes to anchor it in the sand. Easy to take down and store. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this broke the first time we used it. The loop that you put the peg through to anchor it to the ground broke. We figured we could just get by with three pegs in the ground but we took it to the beach for a second time and another loop broke. So it's basically useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: My husband was able to lie down and take a nap with her while the rest of us enjoyed the water
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would keep our six month old granddaughter out of the sun while we were at the beach and this worked perfectly! My husband was able to lie down and take a nap with her while the rest of us enjoyed the water. My husband was able to put it up and take it down by himself though he needed a little help one day when it was extra windy but two people were able to do it without much complication.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent for travel!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this tent!! We bought this to take to FL to use with our 2 year old granddaughter!! My husband and I practiced once in the dining room putting it up and were able to pop it up and down quite quickly on the beach.. even on the windy days!! It was the perfect size! I could even lay down next to her when she was getting sleepy on the beach and wanted to rest in a cool shady spot!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent, only came ripped where one of the polls goes through the mesh was ripped. However it’s not affecting the performance of the tent so we are not sending it back. Great size!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not perfect construction
customer_reviews.text: Really like the tent, it’s a nice size and easy to setup/takedown, but one of the interior panels for the windows is attached backwards so we have to fold it over on the top to close the flap with the Velcro. More of an annoyance than anything.
customer_reviews.author: HouseMouse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The husband did not think he would be able to easily set it up on a very windy Florida beach day. But to our surprise it was setup with ease. Very nice tent glad we made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Norris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!! Was worried it was gonna be to small but it def. is not, enough space for my family of 4 on the beach for sure!! Easy to put up and easier to put down.. gonna buy another one for Grandma!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tricoli

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: I do like how quickly this tent assembles. Unfortualy on my 3rd use one of the pole broke. Hoping to glue it because I do like the tent.
customer_reviews.author: V. M

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This shade tent provided lots of room for babies and moms during some very hot days at the beach. It was easy to set up, take down and store. I have purchased 2 other shade/play tents and this one was an exceptional value. When I had a very minor problem with my order, the Arcshell staff were prompt, courteous and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Lark

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It worked as described, I just expected it to be a little bit easier to pull out and open. It was hard to make it click into place. But the size is great and it works well. We will need it a lot this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mattbw3

customer_reviews.title: Luv it
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent, finally I can enjoy the beach without having to worry about sunburn. I felt so safe I actually took a nap last time I went there and I can never sleep in public. 5 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: I.B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best beach tent for sun protection with kids
customer_reviews.text: Best beach tent for sun protection with kids. Generous size, light weight, super easy set up and take down. The pockets filled with sand to hold it were super secure even with some wind. I can't imagine all day at the beach with my 3 kids without it.
customer_reviews.author: JPerry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get to use it even one time
customer_reviews.text: Tried to put this up for the first time at the beach and one of the poles ripped right through the tent. Couldn’t use it. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: B Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The tent is not terrible if you only use a few times a year, but if you live at the beach and go every weekend than this is not the tent for you. This tent lasted maybe four months of use before it started tearing. The stakes that come with the tent are plastic and do not hold the tent down on windy days. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Take this to the park or the beach...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to unpack and re-pack. Roomy enough to easily fit a family of four (two adults and two kids). Tons of storage pockets, provides ample amount of shade from both the sun and San Francisco breeze. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: not a big fan of the color...gets dirty easily but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really really really like this tent- was easy and quick to figure out and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena-Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to pop up, take down and unlike a lot of things that come in a carrying case, you can actually get this back in the case without too much effort. Works great for 3 people. Could hold 4 but would be a bit crowded.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing... there is a small learning curve on set up. But once we got the hang of it, it was super easy. We have a toddler so it was great to have something he can go into to take his afternoon nap and still keep him in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: DRC

customer_reviews.title: Decent but there are better
customer_reviews.text: Worked good went up and down ok but is very long when folded up and not very wide when fully set up - two chairs is tight - all in all worth the money but i got amdifferent brand wider and folds up smaller i like it better
customer_reviews.author: Bob Digital

customer_reviews.title: spacious, light weight, easy to fold/unfold, comfort, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The tent is spacious, light weight, easy to fold/unfold, comfort, sturdy, and has a competitive price. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lw

customer_reviews.title: The BEST beach tent
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent is awesome! Set up and take down was a breeze! Like literally 30 seconds! Love it and totally recommend it! The other beach goers were so envious! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

product_meta.title: Arcshell Premium Extra Large Pop Up Beach Tent UPF 50+
feature_bullets: Inside the Premium Beach Tent package:1 beach tent,1 carry bag,6 heavy-duty 12 inches stakes,1 stake bag;spacious open up size by height:51.2 inches;width: 94.5 inches;depth:51.2 inches;large enough to fit 2 regular beach chair;super compact folded down size by 30.7 by 5.4 by 5.4 inches for easily fit into a small checked luggage,a checked luggage,or a suitcase onto the plane or in the trunk of car during your trip;6.55 lbs light-weighted; perfect for beach,camping,watching sports games,park

Imported; 190T polyester wall conjoined with a 210D oxford floor; both fully coated with 3000mm PU internally to ensure 100% water-proof and effectively absorb ultra-light; highest UPF protective level 50+ for reliably shielding against at least 98% UVa and UVb rays; 3 extra-large B3 mesh windows perfectly installed in the two opposite sides and at the back of the tent for effective ventilation and bug-repellent; with flaps staying up and down to cover and uncover the window

5 extra-large sandbags for increased stability;together with 6 12 inches durable stakes to handle max 25 mphs wind; 8.5mm fiberglass automatic pop up pole frame system to set up and take down the ten with only one person within 60 seconds; with 2 yellow indicators for easy recognizing the area to hold when taking down; a standard double sewing technique is fully adopted on every suture to ensure an absolutely sturdy and durable seaming which effectively prevents sand leakage on the beach

Extended dome for extra shelter from the sun;extended ground cloth with a heavy-duty plastic and electroplated zipper free from getting rusted when it gets wet;shut the door for complete privacy to change clothes,nap,breastfeed,etc;4 storage bags sewed on the 4 interior corners of the tent for alternative spaces with ease in keeping your phone, tablet, or other handy items;1 large storage bag sewed on the internal upper part of the back wall for keeping your bigger sized items

The exquisitely beautiful and enchanting blue color of the tent makes it an inevitably ideal attraction for a sunny day at the beach or other leisure and recreational activities;our tents are in perfect alliance with the flame-resistant CPAI-84 standard;which is a requirement for all tents in California,Minnesota,Michigan,Louisiana,Massachusetts,New Jersey and New York;printed instructions on the carry bag for convenient check;2-year manufacturer warranty and money-back satisfaction guarantee

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
